## Rune class

A representation of an in-game rune.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Rune 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, data)](./shieldbow.rune._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Rune</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [description](./shieldbow.rune.description.md) |  | string | The description (short version) of this rune provided by Data Dragon. This does not contain the HTML-like tags to help view this better on console or other output media.<!-- -->See [rawDescription](./shieldbow.rune.rawdescription.md) to view the description with the HTML-like tags included. |
|  [details](./shieldbow.rune.details.md) |  | string | The details (long version) about this rune provided by Data Dragon. This does not contain the HTML-like tags to help view this better on console or other output media.<!-- -->See [rawDetails](./shieldbow.rune.rawdetails.md) to view the details with all the HTML-like tags included. |
|  [icon](./shieldbow.rune.icon.md) |  | string | A link to the rune's icon. |
|  [id](./shieldbow.rune.id.md) |  | number | The numerical unique ID of this rune. |
|  [key](./shieldbow.rune.key.md) |  | string | The worded key for this rune. |
|  [name](./shieldbow.rune.name.md) |  | string | The name of this rune. |
|  [rawDescription](./shieldbow.rune.rawdescription.md) |  | string | The raw description (short version) provided by Data Dragon. This contains some HTML-like tags that help to display it on webpages.<!-- -->See [description](./shieldbow.rune.description.md) to view the description with all the HTML-like tags stripped out. |
|  [rawDetails](./shieldbow.rune.rawdetails.md) |  | string | The details (long version) about this rune provided by Data Dragon. This contains some HTML-like tags that help to display it on webpages.<!-- -->See [details](./shieldbow.rune.details.md) to view the details with all the HTML-like tags stripped out. |
